name: Cerrion
headline: Video AI to automatically detect and respond to production lineâ¦
description:
Cerrion helps manufacturers automatically detect, understand and eliminate problems on their production lines using video-based Computer Vision. Our AI leverages standard CCTV cameras and learns how a manufacturing process looks like when things are going well and can automatically detect and track problems in real-time.

For example, one of our customers, a Pepsi supplier producing 500 bottles per minute now automatically detects and reacts to a fallen bottle before it starts blocking their production line.

founders.name: Karim Saleh, Founder
founders.description: Karim is the Co-Founder and CEO of Cerrion. Karim grew up in Egypt where he was a professional athlete and captain of Egypt's Water Polo national team. He represented his country at three world championships while simultaneously  receiving an electrical engineering degree from ETH Zurich. Prior to founding Cerrion Karim has built Unicorn Labs which has helped 30+ startups build their MVPs.

founders.name: Nikolay Kobyshev, Founder
founders.description:
Nikolay is the co-founder and CPO of Cerrion. He is in charge of building a product that Cerrion's users will truly love, and customer success.
He is a serial entrepreneur in the AI and CV space. Prior to Cerrion, Nikolay has built Spectando, an AI engine which generates photorealistic 3D models of real estate objects, and Assaia, a B2B Computer Vision solution which detects irregularities in airportsâ ground operations.
Nikolay holds PhD and MSc degrees in Computer Vision from ETH Zurich.

**Cerrion: Revolutionizing Manufacturing with Video AI**

Cerrion is a Swiss startup that leverages video-based artificial intelligence to help manufacturers automatically monitor and optimize their production lines. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, Cerrion is already making waves by employing AI to detect, understand, and eliminate issues on the factory floor in real time. 

### Mission
The core mission of Cerrion is straightforward: use Video AI to enhance efficiency and safety on production lines. Their technology utilizes standard CCTV cameras to observe manufacturing processes, learn what a smoothly running line looks like, and then automatically spot deviations. For instance, one of Cerrion's clients, a Pepsi supplier, can now identify and address issues like fallen bottles—at a remarkable rate of 500 bottles per minute—before they disrupt operations.

### The Product
Cerrion offers a comprehensive suite of AI solutions designed to cater to different aspects of manufacturing:
- **Process Fault AI:** Monitors critical production areas to identify problems as they arise.
- **Downtime AI:** Keeps tabs on machine efficiency, identifying and tracking downtime events.
- **Line Buffer AI:** Tracks fill levels across all line buffers.
- **Line Speed and Output AI:** Monitors line speed and production output, pointing out any deviations from set benchmarks.

### Benefits and Impact
Cerrion's platform doesn't require extensive changes to existing equipment, making it a non-intrusive addition to production lines. Its deployment is quick—often within a day—allowing manufacturers to see a fast return on investment (ROI). The technology helps stakeholders—from management to floor operators—gain insights into production efficiency, leading to standardized improvements, enhanced safety, and reduced downtime.

### Company Overview
- **Founded:** 2021
- **Location:** Zürich, Switzerland
- **Team Size:** 9 employees
- **Group Partner:** Nicolas Dessaigne
- **Funding:** Cerrion recently raised $5 million to further enhance its video AI capabilities.

### Customer Testimonials
Feedback from clients highlights significant improvements in operational efficiency and faster problem identification. One line supervisor noted how the system tracks and records every issue, allowing for targeted training to enhance machine performance. Another production engineer emphasized the reduced time spent monitoring to determine causes of production drops—now it can be done in minutes thanks to Cerrion’s insights.

### Engaging with Cerrion
If you're interested in how video AI can reshape your manufacturing processes, Cerrion invites you to [schedule a demo](https://www.cerrion.com/<https:/calendly.com/karim-saleh/meeting-with-cerrion?month=2024-09>).

For more information, visit their website at [Cerrion](https://www.cerrion.com/).

In a world where every second counts in production, Cerrion stands out as a pioneer, helping manufacturers accelerate their processes and ensure safety—all through the lens of video AI.
